message.title: First launch
message.message: Welcome to %s! To control your Freebox, you must configure the app first. Do it now?

message.title: No network!
message.message: You must be connected to a Freebox Wi-Fi network to make best use of %s.

epg.connection: You must be connected to Internet to use the program guide.
epg.server: An error occured when connecting to the server. Check your connection and try again.

reset.title: Default Settings
reset.message: Do you really want to delete all %s data ? This operation is not undoable.

config.content:
To configure %s so the app functions with your Freebox, you first have to get the remote code and the box number for each of them (see the sections of the corresponding helps).

Go to the More tab, and then in the Settings section.

%s ables you to use the different profiles so you can control three different Freebox and easily switch between them.

  1. Choose the profile to modify
  2. Enter the remote code of the Freebox to control
  3. Enter the ID of the box to control
  4. Choose the model of the Freebox to control (Freebox HD (v5) or Freebox Révolution (v6))

You can set advanced options in the Settings app of your device.

  • Volume repeat: if active, a press on one of the volume buttons will be repeated at a regular interval as long as you keep the finger on the button. The interval in question can be modified thanks to the corresponding slider.

  • Program repeat: if active, a press on one of the program buttons will be repeated at a regular interval as long as you keep the finger on the button. The interval in question can be modified thanks to the corresponding slider.

  • Long Press: if active, when you press a button a certain time, the press will be considered as long (the same way than with the original remote). The delay in question can be modified thanks to the corresponding slider.

code.content:
To find the remote code of your Freebox HD :

  1. Go to the Free menu by pressing the Free key of your original remote
  2. Select Paramètres
  3. Select Informations Générales

The code is the 8-digit number you can find on the Code télécommande line.

hd.content:
To find the box ID of your Freebox HD :

  1. Go to the Free menu by pressing the Free key of your original remote
  2. Select Paramètres
  3. Select FTP

On the Serveur line, you will see an address of this shape :

ftp://freebox@hd1.freebox.fr

The part in red contains the box ID; in this example, the box ID is 1.

code.content:
To find the remote code of your Freebox Player :

  1. Go to the home screen by pressing the Free key of your original remote
  2. Browse to the left until Réglages is selected
  3. Select Système

The code is the 8-digit number you can find on the Code télécommande à distance line.

hd.content:
To find the box ID of your Freebox Player :

  1. Go to the home screen by pressing the Free key of your original remote
  2. Browse to the left until Réglages is selected
  3. Select Système

The ID is on the line Identifiant du Freebox Player.
